Featured Elections

  • Tennessee example - Simple theoretical demonstration used frequently on English Wikipedia
  • Debian Project Leader 2003 - An election that would have resulted in a tie if RCV/IRV was used
  • Burlington mayoral 2009 - Perhaps the first prominent RCV/IRV election where the IRV and Condorcet winner differed.
  • Alaska 2022 Special - A more recent election where Condorcet and IRV differ.
  • NYC 2025 Mayoral Primary (Democratic Party) - Recent RCV election where Zohran Mamdani won the Democratic primary.
See more featured elections...
